thread.title: Manado, Indonesia: 17 killed in a packed karaoke bar early Sunday
thread.title_full: Manado, Indonesia: 17 killed in a packed karaoke bar early Sunday

author: eTN Managing Editor
title: Manado, Indonesia: 17 killed in a packed karaoke bar early Sunday
text:
Click here for information and nomination Manado, Indonesia: 17 killed in a packed karaoke bar early Sunday 
Seventeen people were killed in a fire that raced through a packed karaoke bar early Sunday on Indonesiaâ€™s Sulawesi island, and 71 others were hospitalized for smoke inhalation. 
The blaze was sparked by a short circuit on the second floor of the three-storey Inul Vizta club in the provincial capital of North Sulawesi after midnight (local time), police spokesman Wilson Damanik said. 
"The fire filled the rooms and corridors with thick black smoke and people started panicking and running helter-skelter in the dark," he said. 
Many complained that fire engines arriving late, about an hour later. It took firefighters several hours to bring the blaze under control. 
He said some panicked people smashed windows and fled into the street while many others were stuck in choking black smoke billowing from the second floor as there was only one access door to the building. 
All 17 people who died were Indonesians. Most died from smoke inhalation injuries rather than burns, Permana said. 
The blaze doesn't seem to be terror related, and victims are local customers, even though many tourists frequent Manado. Oct 25, 2015
